reviewText: BEWARE , DOES NOT WORK IN THE USA !!!!  DON'T BUY IT IF YOU LIVE IN THE USA.
I am in the USA, and this disc is formatted for the UK and thus does not operate in my home. I see now that it says this in the item listing, but I did not notice it, I just wanted the movie.
DO NOT BUY. NOWHERE DOES IT SAY ITS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH A US DVD PLAYER. Should be disclosed.

As a Grandmother giving a gift to my Grandchildren and they call me with too many thank yous and I love you for getting our movie only to have it not work.
Shame on you
Bought this for my nieces birthday and unable to watch on multiple different DVD players! What a waste! Do not buy!!!! Dont waste your money!
Would not play. Did not work. Had to send it back! Cost me extra time and had to pay for services at shipping store!!!!!
Did not work in any DVD player.
did not play in regular DVD/ blue Ray readers
DVD was junk.. first time i opened it and tried to play it, it didn't work. do not buy
it was a gift and my daughter-in-law watched it the other night and said it was in good condition. she loves that movie
